page.title: 02CHURCH HOUSE FARM
page.content: The farm belongs to Mr.J.Probert and is a family farm.The farm is mixed and covers a total area of 300 acres.Out of these 300 acres,47 are for{hops,}100 are for{corn,}24 are for{cider fruit}and 129 are for{grass. The livestock consists of 100 beef steers and 120 ewes and 3 rams which are sold to {Ledbury}and{Hereford markets (these being the two nearest towns). On the farm there are many farming machines such as a bailer,a combine harvester,seven tractors and other cultivating implements.All cider crops are sold to Westons Cider. The usual day is between 7:30_5:00 and the number of workers are 2 but in September another 25 are employed for hop_picking.
